description: This lovely home in Walnut Grove is perfect for down-sizers seeking a peaceful, resort-like setting. It features a main-floor master bedroom, Two additional bedrooms, & a full bath upstairs. Located in a 55+ adult complex, it’s close to the clubhouse, pool, hot tub, and just steps from Save-on-Foods and other shops. Spencer Green offers social events, pool, darts, putting green, and exercise classes to help you enjoy a vibrant community. The home includes a 2-car garage with a new door, wood floors, new hot water tank, and has been fully repainted and has been updated with Poly B piping removed, no worries about finding insurance coverage. It’s ideally situated in a convenient location across from stores, services, and coffee shops. A beautiful place to call home-schedule a look today.
